title: Tahm
body:
How do I get out of his belly?

Allies are supposed to be able to get out when they want.

HOW?

replies.body: Right clicking will cause you to jump out of an allied Tahm Kench's mouth in the direction of the click. There is a delay between being devoured and being able to jump out however, so if you're not seeing an immediate exit you'll need to click again a bit later.

Maybe there needs to be more indicators for when you can and can't escape. In my experience it's honestly felt really unresponsive to the point where i'm convinced it's majorly bugged. An indicator even pops up but then disappears and I have no idea what's going on. I just wish I could get out immediately, so much trolls when one eats you when you don't want him to. :(
For Tahm, he gets a range indicator when he's able to spit them out. You don't get one when you are able to hop out as well?
There is one for a split second, then it'll disappear. It's all very confusing.

please put this in the client under the description of his W, it wasn't explained in the spotlight or in the actual description of his skills of how to actually remove your self from him, it was just said it could be done.

And how big is that delay?

Because I was spamming RMB didn't manage to get out.

Ah.

I was mashing my keyboard trying to get a response that way.
My friends hates me playing Tahm cuz he can a never figure out how to leave on his own.
You just click in the direction you want to go when your in his belly.
